message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.DS

This paper is about measuring synergy in teams or coalitions, which is a topic that falls under the field of game theory. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.GT (Game Theory and Economics). Additionally, the paper uses characteristic function cooperative games as its underlying model, which is a common tool in game theory research. This suggests that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also presents a formal measure of synergy, which involves statistical analysis and modeling, indicating that cs.LG (Machine Learning) could be another relevant sub-category. Finally, the paper investigates alternative characterizations of the synergy measure, which could be related to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
